panels.description: Drops seen on the VM of the source Pod (a drop will appear for only one of "incoming" or "outgoing")
panels.title: Pods with Outgoing Drops (past 10 minutes)

panels.description: Drops seen on the VM of the destination Pod (a drop will appear for only one of "incoming" or "outgoing")
panels.title: Pods with Incoming Drops (past 10 minutes)

panels.description:
Values:
- to-stack: traffic leaving Pod
- to-network/overlay: traffic leaving Node
panels.title: Outgoing Traffic by Trace Type

panels.description:
Values:
- to-endpoint: traffic reaching Pod
- from-network/overlay: traffic reaching Node
panels.title: Incoming Traffic by Trace Type

panels.description: TypeError means there are no drops or no data
panels.title: Heatmap of Outgoing Traffic for Top Source Pods

panels.description: TypeError means there are no drops or no data
panels.title: Heatmap of Incoming Traffic for Top Destination Pods

list.definition: query_result(sum by (workload) (label_replace(hubble_flows_processed_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes", destination=~"^$namespace/[a-z0-9]+$"}, "workload", "$1", "destination", "^$namespace/([a-z0-9]+)")) or sum by (workload) (label_replace(hubble_flows_processed_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes", destination=~"^$namespace/[a-z0-9]+-"}, "workload", "$1", "destination", "^$namespace/(.*)-[a-z0-9]+"))or sum by (workload) (label_replace(hubble_flows_processed_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes", source=~"^$namespace/[a-z0-9]+$"}, "workload", "$1", "source", "^$namespace/([a-z0-9]+)")) or sum by (workload) (label_replace(hubble_flows_processed_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes", source=~"^$namespace/[a-z0-9]+-"}, "workload", "$1", "source", "^$namespace/(.*)-[a-z0-9]+")))
list.label: Workload
list.name: workload

query.query: query_result(sum by (workload) (label_replace(hubble_flows_processed_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes", destination=~"^$namespace/[a-z0-9]+$"}, "workload", "$1", "destination", "^$namespace/([a-z0-9]+)")) or sum by (workload) (label_replace(hubble_flows_processed_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes", destination=~"^$namespace/[a-z0-9]+-"}, "workload", "$1", "destination", "^$namespace/(.*)-[a-z0-9]+"))or sum by (workload) (label_replace(hubble_flows_processed_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes", source=~"^$namespace/[a-z0-9]+$"}, "workload", "$1", "source", "^$namespace/([a-z0-9]+)")) or sum by (workload) (label_replace(hubble_flows_processed_total{cluster="$cluster", instance=~"$Nodes", source=~"^$namespace/[a-z0-9]+-"}, "workload", "$1", "source", "^$namespace/(.*)-[a-z0-9]+")))
